DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate outcomes in patients having vaginal prolapse repair with the Elevate prolapse repair kit and compare these outcomes to patients who had a repair with Prolift. .
DOC.brief_title: Surgical Outcomes of Vaginal Prolapse Repair With Elevate
DOC.detailed_description: The investigators hypothesize that the less invasive Elevate mesh results in a shorter operative time, lower blood loss, complications, postoperative pain and earlier discharge from the hospital.
DOC.criteria: Women who have had a vaginal repair with Elevate prolapse repair kit
